text: The 2016–17 Liga Panameña de Fútbol season (also known as the Liga Cable Onda) also is the 27th season of top-flight football in Panama. The season began on 2016 and is scheduled to end in May 2017. Ten teams will complete throughout the entire season. ==Teams== Atlético Chiriquí finished in 10th place in the overall table last season and were relegated to the Liga Nacional de Ascenso. Taking their place for this season are the overall champions of last season's Liga Nacional de Ascenso Santa Gema. Chepo suffered financial trouble and sold their spot to Atletico Veraguense. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Club ! Home city !
